title: General
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

  • Selection: Rocks from 370 MYA sample.

  • Justification: Transitional fossils are found between 380 MYA (when lobe-finned fishes lived) and 363 MYA (when amphibians appeared) OR between different strata/layers in the correct order.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

2 points maximum

  • Selection: Rocks from 370 MYA sample.

  • Justification: Transitional fossils are found between 380 MYA (when lobe-finned fishes lived) and 363 MYA (when amphibians appeared) OR between different strata/layers in the correct order.

Student response earns one of the available points.

2 points maximum

  • Selection: Rocks from 370 MYA sample.

  • Justification: Transitional fossils are found between 380 MYA (when lobe-finned fishes lived) and 363 MYA (when amphibians appeared) OR between different strata/layers in the correct order.

Student response earns two of the available points.

2 points maximum

  • Selection: Rocks from 370 MYA sample.

  • Justification: Transitional fossils are found between 380 MYA (when lobe-finned fishes lived) and 363 MYA (when amphibians appeared) OR between different strata/layers in the correct order.
